member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setCenterPosition
member.summary: Sets the interface window in the center of the screen.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getDropFileName(int)
member.summary: Returns the name of the drop file by its number.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setFocus
member.summary: Sets the interface window in focus.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.isFocused
member.summary: Returns a value, indicating if the interface window is in focus.
member.returns: 1 if the window is in focus, otherwise - 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setHeight(int)
member.summary: Sets the window height.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getHeight
member.summary: Returns a height of the interface window.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setHidden(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value, indicating if the interface window is hidden.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.isHidden
member.summary: Returns a value, indicating if the interface window is hidden.
member.returns: 1 if the window is hidden, otherwise - 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getIntersection(int,int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the mouse cursor with the given coordinates is positioned on the window.
member.param: X coordinate of the mouse cursor.
Y coordinate of the mouse cursor.
member.returns: 1 if the cursor is positioned on the window; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setMouse(int,int)
member.summary: Sets the mouse position.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getMouseX
member.summary: Returns the mouse position along the X axis.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getMouseY
member.summary: Returns the mouse position along the Y axis.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setMoveable(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if the window is movable.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.isMoveable
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the window is movable.
member.returns: true if the window is movable; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getNumDropFiles
member.summary: Returns the number of drop files.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setParent(int)
member.summary: Sets the parent flag for the interface window. If the window is marked as non-parent (the parent flag is set to 0), this window will be ignored when calling the engine.interface.getCenterPositionX() and engine.interface.getCenterPositionY() functions.
member.param: The parent flag: 1 to mark the interface window as a parent window; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.isParent
member.summary: Returns the parent flag set for the interface window. If the window is marked as non-parent (the parent flag is set to 0), this window will be ignored when calling the engine.interface.getCenterPositionX() and engine.interface.getCenterPositionY() functions.
member.returns: The parent flag: 1 if the window is a parent window; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setPermanentFocus
member.summary: Sets the permanent focus on the interface window. The window is permanently focused if it remains in focus even when its child window is in focus.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.isPermanentlyFocused
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the window is in permanent focus The window is permanently focused if it remains in focus even when its child window is in focus.
member.returns: 1 if the window is in permanent focus; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setPosition(int,int)
member.summary: Sets the window position.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getPositionX
member.summary: Returns the window position along X axis.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getPositionY
member.summary: Returns the window position along Y axis.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setTitle(char)
member.summary: Sets the title for the interface window.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getTitle
member.summary: Returns the title of an interface window.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setWidget(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Widget})
member.summary: Synchronizes the size and position of the interface window with a given widget.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getWidget
member.summary: Returns the interface window widget.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.setWidth(int)
member.summary: Sets the window width.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.getWidth
member.summary: Returns a width of the interface window.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.clearDropFiles
member.summary: Clear all the files that are dragged and dropped to the interface window.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.InterfaceWindow(int,char)
member.summary: Creates an interface window with the specified parameters.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.removeFocus
member.summary: Removes the focus from the interface window.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.TITLE
member.summary: An Interface window has a title bar.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.FRAME
member.summary: An Interface window has only a frame (no title bar).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.MINIMIZE
member.summary: An Interface window has a minimize button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.MAXIMIZE
member.summary: An Interface window has a maximize button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.CLOSE
member.summary: An Interface window has a close button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.InterfaceWindow.DROP
member.summary: The interface window supports drag-and-drop.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.findWindow(Unigine.Ptr{Gui})
member.summary: Returns the number of the Interface window rendered by the given gui instance.
member.returns: Window number, if it exists; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getCenterPositionX(int)
member.summary: Returns the coordinate along the X axis, at which the window of the given width will be positioned in the center of the screen. The function won't return a value in the following cases: If the parent flag of the interface window is set to 0. If the window is hidden. If the window is not focused. If the window is not an instance of the WidgetWindow class.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getCenterPositionY(int)
member.summary: Returns the coordinate along the Y axis, at which the window of the given height will be positioned in the center of the screen. The function won't return a value in the following cases: If the parent flag of the interface window is set to 0. If the window is hidden. If the window is not focused. If the window is not an instance of the WidgetWindow class.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getHeight
member.summary: Returns the screen space height. If there are two monitors arranged vertically, the height of two monitors is returned.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getMouseX
member.summary: Returns the X-coordinate (in the screen space) of the mouse cursor.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getMouseY
member.summary: Returns the Y-coordinate (in the screen space) of the mouse cursor.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getNumScreens
member.summary: Returns the number of available screens (monitors).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getNumWindows
member.summary: Returns the number of Interface windows.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getPositionX
member.summary: Returns the X coordinate of the Interface window.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getPositionY
member.summary: Returns the Y coordinate of the Interface window.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getScreenHeight(int)
member.summary: Returns the height of the given screen (monitor).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getScreenPositionX(int)
member.summary: Returns the position of the given screen (monitor) in a horizontal row in the screen space. If there are two monitors arranged horizontally, the X-coordinate position of the first monitor is 0 and of the second one, for example, 1280.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getScreenPositionY(int)
member.summary: Returns the position of the given screen (monitor) in a vertical column in the screen space. If there are two monitors arranged vertically, the Y-coordinate position of the first monitor is 0 and of the second one, for example, 1024.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getScreenWidth(int)
member.summary: Returns the width of the given screen (monitor).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getVisiblePositionX(int,int,int)
member.summary: Checks if the window of the given width is visible on a screen with the specified border at the given coordinate. If the window is visible, its position will remain the same. Otherwise, it will be updated in order to make the window visible (taking into account the size of the vertical border).
member.param: X coordinate in the screen space.
member.returns: The given X coordinate if the window is visible; otherwise, the X coordinate, at which the window will be visible.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getVisiblePositionY(int,int,int)
member.summary: Checks if the window of the given height is visible on a screen with the specified border at the given coordinate. If the window is visible, its position will remain the same. Otherwise, it will be updated in order to make the window visible (taking into account the size of the vertical border).
member.param: Y coordinate in the screen space.
member.returns: The given Y coordinate if the window is visible; otherwise, the Y coordinate, at which the window will be visible.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getWidth
member.summary: Returns the screen space width. If there are two monitors arranged horizontally, the width of two monitors is returned.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.getWindow(int)
member.summary: Returns an Interface window by its number.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.Interface.setMouse(int,int)
member.summary: Sets position (in screen space coordinates) of the mouse.
